There was no means of making coffee apart from instant and although there was a microwave there was no means of cooking anything in it . No bowls or other receptacles  which meant we could not make a salad or do any cooking at all which was not what i expected from a kitchenette for this price . Often the staff were delightful but there were times when they were very slow ,inattentive and almost rude. title: Плохо
pros: The couple is very money greedy, they say they have to call a Taxi before you arrive - then they pick you up themselves and charge double of the local Taxi....If yyou arrive at night you have to either climb up or go down a very bad mudd way where it is pitch black, Taxis will not go up anyway due to the bad road conditin....i did not have cash to pay upon arrival directly because the bank machine did not work in Cariacou and i arrived at night in Union by boat. I did not know it was not paid already with booking.com (since it usually is) , so i told them no problem tomorrow we will go to the bank.Then my captain called them to tell them something i don't know, but that i would stay the next night and they terrorized me by whatsapp to leave right now at night to the bank, and that they informed the police about it so we cannot leave the island without payment....(why would a normal person do such things, i am on holiday and surely pay everything and i do not look like a broke girl at all...) ...then in the early morning at 8.45 when they drop their kids, then in the morning to leave at 8.35 - but by then i really wanted to leave the place and was anyways ready. The terrace and kitchen images are their own place which they did not like really to share because they live with their nice kids there upstairs - the place you live is downstairs in a kind of a tiny container with metal roof . so if it rains, you feel like in a bush drum concert... i expected that this place was all like in the images, which it acutally is and the owner made a lot of nice things himself which i do respect and liked .- just the friendlyness was not nice and i did not fell welcomed at all to shar e the place, so they basically charge for the images, but acutally you live in a tiny hole with tons of insects.Overall that was the unfriendliest experience i ever had in 30 years of travelling . and this is my first bad review i write ever, but they ruined my whole night.

title: Neat sea-facing apartment overlooking Charlestown,
cons: I scored 3C as 10 because the wi-fi was a bit more reliable than it was a week ago, but still inconsistent. If you need to use a laptop I still recommend hanging out at the coffee shop near the jetty, which has a fast connection (chances are you will go there for breakfast in any case, Nicola has the best espresso machine in the Grenadines).
pros: I stayed in 3B a few days ago and was looking forward to this one, which looks straight out over the village to the sea, the view obscured a little by a big palm tree. In terms of layout I prefer it to 3B, it has a separate kitchen and a private balcony. The price you pay for the view is the sun in your face in the afternoon, the room gets hotter than 3B which looks out sideways (on the sea-moss drying racks !) and gets sun in the morning. There is a split-level aircon as well as a ceiling fan to keep the room cool at night. I didn't self-cater but the equipment seemed sufficient.Sharon & Junior were helpful as ever, including an early morning ride down to the dock for the fast ferry.

title: Un grand merci à Lorna et Albert pour leur gentillesse et leur accueil
pros: Un grand merci à Lorna et Albert pour leur gentillesse et leur accueil. La vue depuis le logement est magnifique.C'est très calme. Spacieux.Nous avons également bien apprécié la table d'hôtes.Une adresse à retenir.

title: Excellent hotel, impeccable service.
pros: Quiet and comfortable, a beautifully situated hotel. Impeccable service. We were picked up by staff member and dropped off at the airport. Excellent food included in the price (breakfast and dinner), in fact the best food we tasted in the Caribbean islands. Room was very clean with a good quality bed. Highly recommended.

title: We loved the beautiful accommodations, food and lovely owners.
cons: Nothing. It doesn’t have ac but the constant breeze was very comfortable.
pros: It was beautiful. The view of the ocean and the beach was amazing. There was a wonderful breeze the cooled everything down. The food was excellent. Sharon and Lennox were excellent host. We spent the evening talking. They were so interesting and engaging.

title: Великолепно
cons: The location is somewhat off the beaten track without a paved road, so aside from the beach, there is not much else around. That said, it made for a bit of an adventure locating the hotel and were rewarded with wonderful hospitality and a wonderfully calm and tranquil stay
pros: Sharon and Lenox were marvellous hosts providing a delicious dinner and breakfast. The bedroom was spacious and the bed very comfortable. Despite no AC, the constant breeze was sufficient for a very comfortable night. Also, we visited the local beach at Brighton Salt Pond which was beautiful and made for a truly authentic Caribbean experience.

title: Великолепно
cons: The food was so good, that we did not manage to make one picture of it before having a bite.
pros: This was more an experience than an accommodation. We felt like in heaven with the owners cooking just for us. We chose to eat local food and got a great variety of dishes. The rooms are spacious, clean, well ventilated and beautiful. Astonishing views of Brighton bay. Sharon and Lennox are the ideal hosts as they give you the attention you need.

title: A great place to stop for your visit to St Vincent.
pros: The Owners were so helpful and friendly and provided some great local knowledge and took us to the local beach which had great facilities.  A truly fab experience. Breakfast and evening meals were so tasty!

title: Великолепно
cons: No complaints at all
pros:
Spotlessly clean, spacious room with lots of light and the most comfortable bed of our whole trip.
Sharon arranged our taxi from the airport,  and after a little time to get settled we were treated to welcome drinks and a beautiful home cooked meal.
The pictures really don't do this place justice. It's in a peaceful and safe location, only 10 minutes walk from Brighton beach.
Breakfast was great with the opportunity to try local specialties,  Lennox gave recipes and  showed me what to buy in the market to recreate them.
If we go back to St Vincent the Milligan will be our first choice.

title: Excellent. I would certainly return.
pros:
clean, spacious, light and airy. Great space to chill and enjoy the magnificent view from the terrace. 
Sharon the owner was an absolute highlight

title: The Milligan has wonderful friendly attentive hosts, is very clean and quiet, and the food was very good.
pros: It was wonderful talking with Sharon, and Lennus was an  attentive chef, cooking local food as requested. His homemade bread, Pina colada, smoothies and grilled pork were especially  excellent. The view of the sea was lovely. It was located far from the regular tourist locations, so was quiet, and a good place to relax and unwind. The road to get there was sometimes quite rough and rocky. We had a nice walk to Brighton Beach (black sand.) The hosts made certain we knew the way by walking with us for part of the way.

title: Enjoyable stay and would recommend this accommodation

pros: Breakfast and dinner was very good  friendly hosts. Comfortable and clean

pros:
it is beautifully situated on a hill overlooking the sea. there is a lovely breeze on the wide veranda.
it is exceptionally clean. Sharon and Lennox are perfect hosts, even taking us to the beach for a swim and sun downers with the locals!
we returned to a tasty dinner.

title: Великолепно
pros: The Milligan is an exceptional hotel - Sharron and Lennox go out of their way to ensure that you are comfortable throughout the entirety of your stay. The rooms are large and extremely clean and the breakfast and dinners that are included are outstanding. Using local, seasonal produce and introducing guests to Caribbean specialities, their hospitality is second to none. Beyond this, Sharron and Lennox organise day excursions, allowing you to get a feel for St Vincent and to experience and learn about the history and natural beauty of the island.

title: Ideale Unterkunft für authentischen und entspannten Aufenthalt an der sonnigen Westküste St.Vincent.
pros: Schöne Lage im oberen Teil der kleinen Städtchens Layou an der Westküste .Sehr hilfsbereite und freundliche Gastgeber. Wir wurden zum Einkaufen in den großen Supermarkt im Nachbarort Buccament gefahren.Bekamen ein lokaltypisches sehr leckeres  Abendessen von der Gastgeberin kredenzt.Der Nachbar hat ein kleines Taxi-Unternehmen , ideal für Inselausflüge mit fairen Preisen.Im Ort Layou Bäckerei, Gemüseladen , ATM , Strand und kleine Kneipen alles  auch fussläufig erreichbar.Ebenfalls zu Fuß Ausflüge zum  Buccament-Beach , zu den Petroglyphen von Layou und Bambareaux Beach erlaufbar.Alle und alles hier sehr freundlich und authentisch.

title: Il posto giusto per scoprire la magia dell'isola di Principe (e della sua gente).
pros: L'accoglienza calorosa dello staff, il panorama superbo (sul tramonto e la Baia delle Guglie), la tranquillità assoluta, i cieli stellati, gli uccelli della foresta. La struttura semplice, tipica, ben inserita nel contesto. Le colazioni, le cene, gustose, abbondanti, genuine, preparate con cura da Marizete e Linda. Le escursioni proposte da Ronaldo, guida affidabile e simpatica (che oltretutto preparara ottime Caipirihna). Un progetto di turismo responsabile e sostenibile, a beneficio di una piccola comunità locale, il modo migliore per toccare con mano, senza finzioni né filtri, la magia dell'isola di Principe. Al momento i due ecolodge hanno lampade solari. No wifi, no prese per caricare i cellulari (consiglio accumulatori portatili o ricaricare quando ci si reca a Sant'Antonio per pranzo o per fare acquisti). Consigliato a gruppi di amici o coppie. Indispensabile noleggiare un mezzo (auto o moto), l'organizzazione può provvedere a tutto, purché avvisati con adeguato anticipo.

title: Ursprünglich, naturnah und einfach gehalten. Nichts für Luxusreisende aber für Abenteurer.
cons: Im ersten Moment hatten wir nicht erwartet, dass die Unterkunft ohne Strom ist (ggf. haben wir uns nicht ausreichend informiert). Allerdings konnten wir uns schnell auf die Situation einstellen und haben die Zeit wirklich genossen. Powerbank und Taschenlampen sind grundsätzlich zu empfehlen bei einer Reise nach São Tomé und Príncipe.
pros: Die Unterkunft überzeugt mit ihrer Lage durch den atemberaubenden Ausblick und dem freundlichen Personal. Trotz Sprachbarrieren haben wir immer eine Lösung gefunden und bei Bedarf wurden wir durch den englisch sprechenden Besitzer per Telefon oder einem Freund vor Ort unterstützt. Wir haben viel Hilfe bekommen, als unser Auto auf einer Tour kaputt ging. Wir haben noch nie auf unseren Reisen so viele freundliche Menschen auf einem Fleck Erde erlebt. Angst vor Insekten sollte man nicht haben, aber das Bett ist durch ein Moskitonetz in der Nacht gut geschützt.

title: Une découverte inoubliable!
cons: La gentillesse de l'équipe,  leur professionnalisme avec une relation tellement personnelle... un moment lumineux !
pros: Un bungalow dans un lieu époustouflant ! Tellement unique!

title: O paraíso existe!
cons: Gostámos de absolutamente tudo! A melhorar, apenas informar os clientes à chegada dos custos dos vários serviços (refeições, água potável, passeios com guia, etc.). Ao contrário dos restantes estabelecimentos na ilha do Príncipe, aqui são praticados preços justos e corretos nas várias atividades propostas.
pros: Como colocar em palavras a experiência de sonho que tivemos nas duas noites passadas aqui.. O mínimo que posso dizer é que fomos recebidos por toda a equipa com o coração, como se fizéssemos parte das suas famílias. A comida deliciosa e o carinho da Marisete, o passeio fantástico que fizemos na excelente companhia do Ronaldo, toda a amabilidade e disponibilidade do Vivi e do vigilante. Verdadeiramente 5 estrelas! E como se não bastasse, o sítio é simplesmente mágico. Por agora, apenas duas cabanas mergulhadas em plena natureza com uma vista que deixa qualquer um sem palavras. É ainda um projeto em expansão, quando fomos ainda não havia eletricidade nem ligação à água mas está a ser feito e mesmo assim a nossa experiência foi perfeita. Desejamo-vos toda a sorte do mundo neste projeto bonito, que certamente será um sucesso!

title: Великолепно
pros: Probably one if not the best place on the island. The beach is pristine, a 1km stretch of sand with no one around. Turtles hatching is a must-see and magical moment. Considering the remote location, food options are pretty scarce but tasty and cheap. Remember that the last 15 km are the roughest roads you'll probably ever drive on, use a 4WD and consider spending only a few nights if you want to explore the entire island or you'll be stuck there. Nearby villages provide a vibrant community but there is nothing more than a few local bars; buy food and fill your tank in Sao Tome city because that's the nearest place in the supply chain you'll encounter on the road.

title: Overall fairly nice stay, due to the beautiful beach location, and despite basic and noisy bungalows
cons: Mundane and limited breakfast. No bread, had to pay for water. Very limited restaurant menu, although meals have to be ordered in advance. Wifi does not work outside staff room - i.e. no wifi in bungalows, in the restaurant or in the common areas. No housekeeping, no hot water, no viable transfer options, only "moto" across a ~4 km track which is a nightmare with luggage. Staff has a 100 % lack of English skills. Building materials and junk scattered around the property, as well as some bottles and garbage at the beach. A lot of noise from slamming doors and window lids, especially from the other guests sharing the building.This place is all about the beach location and currently nothing else. But with some cleanup, maintenance and service mindedness it could be so much more.
pros: Location, beach and nature. Fantastic sunset views. Relatively few other visitors.

title: Great spot to watch turtles
cons: The path to the restaurant is not amazing. The lights are too high, they should be on the path to proper light it better without impact to the wildlife. For check in it would be great to share some housekeeping rules on how to be on the lodge because of the extreme proximity you have to the wildlife during the night.
pros: Pretty good for what we wanted to do with was the Turtle watching. A bit far from the main town like an 1hr walk, there might be other better options if you want to be more central but if you want piece and quiet and immerse yourself in an unique experience this is a good spot.

title: Хорошо
cons: The bungalows are very sparsely furnished and obviously not finished (loose wires).In case of rain there is no real space where to sit protected, the terraces are very small and exposed to the rain when a little windy (which was our case).
pros: Bungalows are on the beach.The restaurant is very nicely located and the food is good.Staff is extremely helpful and friendly.

title: Best location in Sao Tome.
cons: Quality of the mattress - same as Domus Guesthouse. But does the job for few nights.
pros: Location is prime! For me the most beautiful beach of Sao Tome Island, the road to get there is not great but it's doable, and definitely worth it. I loved the kitties they have around. The restaurant location is really amazing too and the staff was very friendly. The accommodation itself is very basic but you don't need more when staying in a place with such natural beauty. There was not hot water but from other reviews this was something I anticipated so no biggie. You can hear the ocean from the bed, it's really a lovely experience. Wish I had stayed an extra night.

title: Amazing stay. I would definitely come back.
cons: We didn’t have hot water. Apparently they have solar panels and the weather when we were there was not very sunny, so that might be the reason. But it’s ok, it’s not difficult to take a cold shower in a hot climate anyway. Breakfast was simple and always the same. There is room to improve here.
pros: The location couldn’t be better and the place beautiful. Despite being a little remote there are a few places around where we could eat good food. Staff always very helpful.

title: Очень хорошо
cons: Getting there is a challenge due to poor road conditions.
pros: Directly on the ocean, breakfast overlooking the waves, super relaxed and peaceful

title: Alleinreisender Ende August
cons:
- Awesome place right at beach, but at Praia jale it is not recommended to swim (at least in august whilst my stay). 
- therefore one could think about some easy to implement extensions in terms of comfort, for example: some sun loungers or beanbags;  why not sell some fruits/coconuts at the beach; Coffee in the Restaurant is..; maybe a wifi-repeater .. I was overall ok with the stay there, these are just some ideas ;)
pros: Lage, Personal, sichere Stromversorgung

title: Ideal location for a relaxing couple of days!
cons: Accommodation is very basic and not in anyway sound-proof, so definitely take ear plugs. I don’t think words can sum up the condition of the roads on the last 20km of the journey, probably the slowest and worst roads we’ve driven on, though it was all part of the adventure!!!
pros: Amazing location, the staff were super friendly and helpful, we had the most idyllic day on the beach and literally had it to ourselves for the entire day! Very glad we decided to make it to Praia Jale and would definitely recommend Domus.

title: Очень хорошо
cons: At the moment there is a limited number of bungalows, but plans are to build more and this will impact privacy during stay.
pros: Bungalows are on the beach

title: Превосходно
cons: hot water to take a bath
pros: great breakfast

title: Очень хорошо
cons: quite expensive food and beverages and no alternatives around, bad road but doable with a Jimmy. plan enough time (1,5 h) for the last 15 km.
pros: nice location at the beach. we could organize the boat to Ilha das Rolas (15€ per person from Porto Alegre), the mangrove tour and saw the turtle hatching with a guard in the morning. huge pulpit dishes

title: Очень хорошо
cons: Restaurant was too expensive
pros: Beach was amazing

title: It was perfect and we will return
cons: Beware of the lunch and dinner in the nearby! There are few places to eat and you have to book for the meals in advance and they are all 10€ per person in cash plus drinks!
pros: I loved the place, it was paradise, the people, the warm and turquoise sea, good breakfast despite being almost the same but it had plenty to eat. It was safe and you could go for a walk to the other beaches nearby or trough the jungle. We fell asleep with the sound of the waves it was relaxing. We saw the baby turtles leaving the eggs and going to sea. It was perfect. The staff was great and solved eve

title: Untouched beach
cons: It is remote. Road is bad, you really need to take your time. Ocean waves were too loud! :D
pros: It is remote. Close to the ocean, far away from the village. It is clean as much as it can be. Turtles. Sometimes the restaurant only opens upon request, generally for the south island is not a bad idea if you take some spare food with yourself.

title: Очень хорошо
cons: Breakfast start at 08-00 only so if you want to start in the morning as we did no chance you will have it.
pros: Guesthouse situated in the best beach of São Tomé. At night you can see turtles around. Rooms have 24h electricity and warm water. Good place to stay at the southern tip of the island.

title: Great spot
cons: Strangely they didn’t have a mosquito net.. a fan would make a difference too!!
pros: The fact that they had electricity 24/7 plus Wi-Fi!

title: Nice beach but very simple accomodation
cons: Wifi did not work.Staff not the friendliest, maybe because of lacking english language skills.Very, very simple bungalow that was situated on a hill and not on the beach as we expected.If you want to visit this beach and stay right on the beach there is an other place close by that will fulfill this wish much better.
pros: Nice beach even if it's not the best for swimming.

title: paradise
cons: They could change the trash daily proactively and a better cooperation with the turtle people would be nice, like give guests a laminated flyer in every possible language to tell them to NOT walk around with their phone flashlight and flash photography at the beach at night as it’ll scare away the turtles.
pros: fantastic place to stay! we were honestly shocked about the partly bad reviews here. the breakfast and dinner are massive and very delicious and great selection of different things like fresh fruit, eggs, bread, Marmelade etc. Dinner you can choose between fish, polvo, chicken etc., also very delicious and a bit different every day. Also they have super cold beer and different types. The staff is fantastic, the kindest and smartest we had on the island. We had a bungalow for us and it was very spacious and we slept well with the sound of the breaking waves. They have 24/7 electricity and water, as well as strong wifi at reception and surrounding houses, which is luxury in STP. Yes there is no hot water but considering geb temperatures you will be delighted by the not hot water. Also remember you’re still in Africa and you didn’t book a chalet in Switzerland here. The place is basically at the end of the world, and the off-road trip will reward you with the most fantastic beach, plus turtles! Also they Organise day trips to Isla das rolas for only 15€ for 2 people! We would really like to thank everyone from the place for the great time, we even extended our stay there.

title: Simple wooden challets in paradise
pros: The challets are basic, made of solid wood, but you dont need more here. They are located right on the beach with turtles nests just meters away from your door. Staff always polite, in good mood and at your service.

title: Extremely friendly and helpful staff
pros: clean and new rooms. very comfortable beds and good aircon.

title: Превосходно
cons: N/A
pros: Friendly staff. The room was well appointed and the breakfast was good

title: Friendly and went out of their way to assist with a  bag lost by the airline
cons: nothing
pros: good variety with the breakfast, and the quantity was good

title: Превосходно
pros: We had a clean room and especially liked the excellent breakfast. The host also rented us a jeep for two days, with which we could wonderfully discover the island.

title: Очень хорошо
cons: Location.
pros: Breakfast and A/C. The staff was very helpful

title: Очень хорошо
cons: When we asked about the price of dinner, we were told an approximate number and then got surprised when the final bill came at the end of the stay
pros: Awesome food, Carlos is a great cook. Very good and clean room

title: Великолепно
pros: Breakfast very good, the personal very very nice! I am very happy

title: Comfortable, clean and good value for money!
cons: everything was great!
pros: Super nice little property in the city of Santo António. Carlos’s reception and assistance in arranging a motorcycle was amazing. Breakfast was varied every day with fresh fruit, juices, eggs, bacon was a lovely start to every morning. Carlos arranged a beautiful crab appetizer during the football match and we opted for dinner at the property twice which was delicious and filling both nights. Super grateful! obrigada por tudo!

title: Great experience. Recommended!
pros: Carlos, the person in charge of the accommodation, is fantastic. Always ready to help and caring to make sure you don't miss anything. There is the possibility to have lunch and dinner at the lodge, we only had dinner and we really recommend it. The food is delicious and the service is wonderful!The price-quality ratio is good, considering that Santo Tome and Principe is an expensive destination. The room is comfortable and we never lacked hot water. The site is located in Santo António. It is perfect if you want to go out and see the town, even without a car.

title: Very bad experience
cons: The room has humidity on the walls, which ia not healthy. During the nights, the bathroom was flood with water. The first days, velam water, but the lata night, we caem back to the room at 23h and the bathroom was flooded with what series to be urine. Smelled very very bad, from outeide the room, incide it was disgusting and impossible to stand. We called the owner, with did not even apologize for what was happening and he asked its staff to give ia anotarem room, which was not clean. It was a room from other clients who had lectivo that day. We had to make our own bed bringing the linen, from the precious smelling room. Our belongings that were in the flooded bathroom, were stinking and we had to fetch the in the next morning. It was a discusting experience and there was no compensation proposed by the owner. Not even washing our belongings.
pros: The residencial was ok, and the staff working/cooking there, very helpfull.

title: Once in a lifetime experience on a beautiful and very unique island
cons: Everything was really good!
pros:
To stay at Residencial Brigada for a week was a very special experience and it was truly amazing. Carlos and his Family are lovely people and they help you out with everything you need. He has a lot of connections on the island if you plan to do activities outside of the accommodation and he always has an open ear. 
The cook is very talented and you should really have him cook lunch or dinner for you. The breakfast is very delicious. All the meals are mainly done with local ingredients from their own small garden. If you want to stay at a family run place and experience the local life on Príncipe this is the place you should go to.

title: Превосходно
cons:
El desayuno realmente no merece la pena, no vale los 10€ y lo ponen tarde, pierdes un par de horas de luz. 
Al llegar nos pidieron más por mejorar la habitación, no nos dieron muchas opciones para no aceptarlo.
pros: Cómodo. La habitación era amplia y el baño correcto. Al estar en la ciudad permite disfrutar la vida de la ciudad.

title: Превосходно
pros: Residencial muito agradável e acolhedora. Pequeno-almoço fresco e diversificado todos os dias com direito a muita fruta, ovos, omeletes e sumos frescos. Tanto o Carlos, como os seus funcionários, mostraram-se sempre disponíveis para nos ajudar com qualquer questão como o aluguer de carro ou o guia turístico.Vale a pena jantar na residencial e provar as receitas do Carlos. Ainda que seja um pouco caro, são servidos diversos pratos com bastante qualidade. Foi, sem dúvida, a melhor refeiçao que fizemos na ilha.

title: Carlos is erg vriendelijke en wil alles voor je regelen
cons: zeer kleine kamer, erg gehorig en de gezamenlijke buitenruimte was erg beperkt.
pros: centraal gelegen in het vriendelijke stadje santo antonio, dus ook op loopafstand een paar restaurantjes.

title: Uma boa opção na cidade de Santo António
cons: No segundo dia tentei cancelar a reserva que tinha feito e pago em adiantado (extra-booking), deixei o quarto livre até antes da hora do almoço, mas o gerente cobrou-me metade da reserva á mesma. Dado que o quarto foi entretanto ocupado por outra pessoa, e dadas as circunstâncias, achei desnecessário.
pros: Bem localizado. Quarto minúsculo mas muito confortável, com tv, a/c. Membros do pessoal super simpáticos e acolhedores.

title: Velmi pěkné ubytování za rozumnou cenu, velmi vysoké ceny jidel
cons: Majitel byl celkem nepříjemný. Dělal tam sice jídla téměř dokonalá, ale jeho ceny jsou velmi vysoké. Nebyl ochotný mi zajistit tranfer na letiště
pros: Hotel není sice v centru, ale všude je blízko. Za rohem je velký supermarket. V hotelu je všechno domyšlené do detailu.

title: lugar increible
pros:
Estuvimos en Residencial Brigada del 13/01 a 18/01. Carlos y todos los trabajadores del hotel estuvieron siempre atentos a todo lo que pudimos necesitar. Nos ayudaron a conseguir coche, barco, guía y transfer al aeropuerto. Cenamos dos noches en el hotel y la comida casera estaba excepcionalmente buena. Pudimos probar platos tipicos de Príncipe. La habitacion estaba muy limpia, con aire acondicionado y tv nuevos y cama nueva y muy cómoda. El baño estaba impoluto. 
Residencial Brigada está muy céntrico para dar un paseo por las mañanas y noches y poder conocer la vida de la capital.
Recomendamos 100% alojarse aquí.

title: Превосходно
pros: Carlos, en fantastisk vert. Blid og hyggelig, serviceinnstilt. God frokost. Og han lagde veldig god middag til oss på forespørsel to tanger. Ikke mange bra steder å spise i Santo Antonio, bortsett fra en portugisisk restaurant. Carlos kjenner mange folk og kan ordne mye. Rent rom, deilig aircon (strømmen ble slått av på natten av "byen" så ble varmt men det gikk greit. Obs, man bør komme seg ut på strendene og omvisning rundt på øya på dagtid. Anbefaler dette stedet hvis du skal bo i Santo Antonio. Og man kan betale via bankoverføring.  Carlos hjalp oss til og med etter at vi hadde reist fra øya, ved å gi tips på messenger

title: Agradável bemvinda ao Príncipe
cons: O traslado do aeroporto tinha custo e não tava bem detalhado na descripção, além de não responder essa mesma pergunta que fizemos no xat do site.O preço do pequenho almoço foi caro e também os cafesinhos que bebimos depois.
pros: Jozé recebeu-nós com muita amabilidade e um zumo de ananás delicioso.Toda a ajuda do cheffe com as bikes e o aluguer do carro.O pequenho almoço tava muito bom maia foi caro.

title: Превосходно
pros: Stedet ligger i utkanten av «byen» og beliggenheten er ikke veldig idyllisk, men har så absolutt sin sjarm. Stedet er rent og ryddig og det tilbys veldig god mat, både frokost, lunsj, middag og piknik. Carlos og familien hans er det perfekte vertskap de gjør det de kan for å få gjestene til å ha et fint opphold med mange gode opplevelser. Vi leide bil av Carlos noe som gav oss mange flotte muligheter. Carlos kan noe engelsk, noe som er en stor fordel. De er et perfekt vertskap som skjønner balansegangen mellom å tilby tjenester og opplevelser og trekke seg tilbake slik at han ikke er for pågående. Kan anbefale et opphold på det varmeste.

title: Очень хорошо
pros:
Ambiente caseiro
Simpatia do Dono, Sr. Carlos

title: Carlos nos ayudó con todo.
cons: La habilitación despedida un olor a humedad, aunque estaba muy limpia. Y que tanto el desayuno como la cena era a una hora concreta, por lo que a veces resultaba difícil poder organizarlo según la actividad que queríamos realizar ese día.
pros:
Estamos encantados con Carlos y su familia, nos ayudaron en prácticamente todo: en el traslado del aeropuerto al alojamiento, en la gestión de alquiler de moto, excursión en barco por la isla, ver tortugas, excursión por el Parque Natural Obo, lo dicho, prácticamente en todo .
Tanto los exteriores como la habitación estaban muy limpias. De 21h a 7h cortaban la luz, pero era algo generalizado en toda la isla. 
El desayuno era muy completo, todo casero y delicioso, así como los zumos, que los realizaban en ese mismo momento de frutas naturales. 
En nuestro caso decidimos también cenar en el alojamiento y la verdad fue todo un acierto, todo era comida típica, fresca, variada, deliciosa y muy buena cantidad. 
Se podía pagar tanto en Euros como en la moneda local, así como por trasferencia (algo no muy típico en la isla).

title: Превосходно
pros: Comida deliciosa. Simpatia e disponibilidade.

title: Uma boa surpresa no Príncipe!
cons: Nada a apontar.
pros: Foi uma excelente estadia! O Sr. Carlos e a família são muitos simpáticos e acolhedores. Estava tudo limpo e a comida era uma delícia. Além do pequeno-almoço, aconselho a jantarem mesmo na residencial porque foram das melhores refeições da ilha. A internet também é muito boa. O Sr. Carlos ainda nos ajudou com o aluguer do carro, com o guia e com um remédio caseiro milagroso para a tosse. Aconselho a estadia.

title: Превосходно
pros: Estuvimos muy cómodos, la comida está muy buena y muy bien preparada. Carlos y su familia son muy atentos y nos ayudaron en todo lo que necesitamos.

title: Очень дорого - но похоже, нет выбора
cons: Конечно, по своему настоящему уровню это не пятизвёздочная гостиница (3-4 звезда максимум). Пяти звёздам соответствует только цена за номер. Всё очень дорого - и проживание и питание (в целом довольно однообразное) и алкоголь. Особых проблем во время самого недельного нахождения не было, за исключением того, что на третий день сломался замок в нашем номере и пришлось переселяться в соседний.
pros: Сан-Томе сама по себе очень недооценённая страна, вдалеке от обычных туристических направлений. И это напрасно, поскольку тут очень красивая природа и превосходные пляжи. К сожалению, инфракструктура для пребывания гостей развита пока плохо и особого выбора, где остановиться, нет.

title: Great place - definitely coming back
cons: I have nothing bad to write
pros: calm and relaxing - great location and friendly staff

title: it was fine but fail to understand why everything is so expensive when salaries are so low.
cons:
No option to make coffee in the room. 
No English news tv channels.
pros: location

title: nice venue but food needs work.
cons: The variety of food was limited. There were no labels to say what each dish was, so it was difficult to know whether it contained something you couldn’t eat! no staff really around to ask and when something ran out, it wasn’t replaced easily
pros: Very well located with a lovely pool and close to a beach.

title: Quite hotel, in the city right on the bay.
pros: Location to the airport, free shuttle, quiet hotel in the city, right on the bay with room/balcony view to the water. Friendly helpful staff. Basic but good enough for a one night stay after arriving from the evening flight from Lisbon. we enjoyed the breakfast buffet. especially the local fruits, cakes and coffee, it was so yummy.

title: great place to stay in northern part of island
cons: dinner buffet is pricy, room is a little overpriced
pros: great location, delicious breakfast, beautiful pool, nice spa

title: Comfortable option on Sao Tomé
cons: Bathroom could have been cleaner. A lot of water stains. Reception was having a lot of technical issues, which meant that the room card stopped working from time to time. Ridiculously bad hotel bar with very limited selection and stupidly high prices.
pros: Very nice location, good starting point for exploration. Very "Westerner" friendly setup, comparable with European 4* hotels. Friendly staff and beautiful Infinity pool

title: Pleasant and comfortable stay, despite the prices practiced.
cons: The availability of the staff at the reception, the overall maintenance level of the infrastructure (including room) and the prices practiced at the hotel (both room and own transportation) are not at the expected level for such a brand.Overall value, considering the expensive rates, below expectations
pros: The location was really good, allowing quick access, walking, to the city center.The food served in the hotel, the room view to the ocean, the surrounding gardens and landscape were all top.

title: Great stay, good food
cons: the bed could've been a bit more comfortable
pros: the breakfast had good variety and the location was great and easy to locate

title: Очень хорошо
cons:
The weak availabilty of the reception staff, always occupied with own tasks even if there was a qeue of guests waiting.
The readiness of the reception team to organize the delivery of simple accessories (e.g iron and iron board), which I believe are basics for these categories of hotels.
pros: The location, the food, the general infrastructue and the friendly atmosphere.

title: Очень хорошо
cons: We had problems with the door lock. It was not opening with the card given. It was very frustrating because I  had to go downstairs each time the lock didn't open. That's the only major  sour experience there.  Secondly, the internet  network was also frustrating. Connections were poor
pros: The location was perfect and the facilities were clean

title: A good international standard hotel
cons: The value for money was somewhat less that we were hoping - I would consider the hotel to be a good 4 star, but the pricing was 5 star
pros: This is a international standard hotel in Sao Tome, providing high end accomodation and facilities for international visitors.  It is outside the city centre, but a thirty minute walk will take you there

title: Clean and friendly, conveniently located on the seafront, probably overpriced overall.
cons: The food is very good, but does not quite meet the fine expectations that come with the price.
pros: The location is convenient for Sao Tome town and the airport. It is on the seafront and is well placed to take in the sunshine and sea. The rooms are very clean and comfortable.

title: Great place with great staff. Would definitely recommend.
cons: We didn’t internet for two days because of a rainstorm.
pros: The swimming pool. The view.

title: not good enough for the price they ask
cons: the state of the hotel, the menu prices
pros: the location (for walkarounds) and view are amazing

title: Очень хорошо
pros: The location and view is simply beautiful. Sunset is picturesque.

title: Хорошо
cons: Food
pros: Location, pool

title: Хорошо
cons: The room could have been a bit more clean. The floor was not very well cleaned.
pros: The staff, breakfast and the overall reception.

title: Очень хорошо
cons: Is a expensive place for eat or drink
pros: Is a good place for rest.

title: Verblijf uitstekend, reception desk needs a lot of improvement
cons: When I was checking out, there was a lot of trouble with my bill, I had to pay the rooms when I was arriving, I paid cash (in dollar) and they could not give back (they told me that they would put this 44 dollar on my room-account as a negative saldo). And when I was checking out that 44 dollar, (that I needed in return for my room-payment) was not mentioned on my final bill, so I didn't got it back.There was even some discussion about the payment of my room at that time, only when I have shown my bill-invoices that I have paid then they deducted the room of the final bill.For a 5-star hotel, this should have been handled a lot better. And at least the bill should be correct and people should get there re-funds if they pay in cash.
pros: Kindness of the staff, expecially in the restaurant and bar

title: it would have been great if it was not for the unpleasant initial experience.
cons:
the room was not prepared, the bathtub was dirty, the electronic key did not work and the hotel initially did not want to repair the lock
there was nobody to help with the luggage!
pros: location

title: Великолепно
pros: The hotel is clean and well located. It has a nice swimming pool and the area to rest. The breakfast is good for a buffet. The staff in the hotel is friendly and overall helpful. Expect that the prices in the hotel are higher than anywhere else. It is a good starting point coming from the airport.

title: This hotel should be only 3 star
cons: almost everything, our suite had no tea/coffee facilities, no bathrobe or slippers, room access card never worked and breakfast was cold cuts ham & cheese and pastries
pros: location

title: Poor
pros: Appalling communication - I emailed 4 times asking for airport pick up, eventually got a taxi, they replied to my request the day after we left.I opted for half board on booking.com as we were coming from Lisbon and arrived late. This was not cheap(291 euros for 1 night) yet reception staff claimed I had booked room only. Payment was demanded before we went to the room, which had a small balcony while those apparently empty below had large terraces. Eventually the staff agreed we could have some of the very unappetising buffet (which included a large fish cooked some time before and sitting under lights). We had to protest further to get a gristly piece of meat cooked to order.The next morning we were leaving for a 9am flight but breakfast was not available at 6.45 only coffee. I was told breakfast would start at 7 but it was later.All in all a very unsatisfactory experience. I booked the Pestana for comfort and service while travelling. I feel we would have been better served by staying in a cheaper small local hotel. This outpost does not match normal Pestana standards.

title: Fair, poor facilities for a "luxury" hotel, not luxury at all, but price of a 5 star...!
cons: Old facilities. No hot water!?
pros: Location

title: Великолепно
cons: The only downside being that it's a bit far from the beach. This is solved by the included transport.
pros: This is simply an amazing place. The rooms are great, the service is excellent. The location is superb and the food is great.

title: Превосходно
cons: Of course it had been nice and comfortable with pool.
pros:
Very nice and friendly stuff
The food was very good and the boat trip and the trip to the cacao plantage was very good! They guides took very well care of us and tell oss about the history.

title: Great stay at Sundy Praia.
cons:
Staff should refill food and dessets at breakfast and dinner buffets so guests that arrive later have also the same options -not all products are available at all times, in particular desserts.
Bit of poor organisation with the free daily activities for the guests, some were fully booked for the day after when we arrived there hence we had to stick to the available options.
pros:
I am rating Sundy Praia and not Roça Sundy as we were offered an upgrade and stayed in the villas instead, which was a nice surprise.
All was beyond perfect, the villas in the jungle and their private beach were absolutely stunning!
Food was good too, place is calm and clean, and the staff, in particular the young men at the front desk will go the extra mile to make you feel home!

title: Unforgettable and unique stay in a beautifully renovated plantation with a very special atmosphere and warm staff
cons: Nowhere to go without transportation, although this is provided by the hotel free of charge.
pros:
Well kept and faithfully renovated plantation providing a glimpse into Príncipe’s colonial history. Nice and comfortable rooms. Stylish yet cozy restaurant with garden and orchids, overlooking the combined rainforest and cocoa plantation hillsides down towards the sea, dotted with tall, tropical trees.
The stay may be pricey, but includes breakfast and three courses dining of high international standard, Portuguese wine, and in the daytime unlimited transportation and guided tours of your choice.

title: Wonderful stay in historic setting
pros: Wonderful historic place, extremely comfortable rooms, we had an amazing stay

title: Perfect to relax

pros:
As refeições apesar de poderem ter um toque mais local, eram excelentes.
Os funcionários do hotel são muito amáveis e simpáticos. 
O hotel inclui ainda actividades diárias com guia incluído. O guia podia ser mais dinâmico e comunicativo.

title: Relaxing, stylish/cosy vibe.
pros:
The quiet, surrounding green garden and pool area. so relaxing and peaceful. Well kept gardens, cosy, spacious and stylish rooms. 
Delicious and large servings of food in the restaurant and room service. Friendly, helpful staff. Free airport shuttle and fast wifi all over the hotel. Location only 5 mins from the airport and location in the town across the street from a bay, loved looking out the window to the water while having breakfast. They kept our suitcases for us while we spent the next few days over in Príncipe. Secure parking for our jeep rental. Safe in the room, mini fridge to keep cold drinks and kettle to make tea/coffee in the room. We would stay here again.

title: exceptional and exceeded expectations
cons: Nothing I could seriously fault.
pros: A really excellent hotel, well run, well appointed and very friendly.  Breakfast was good but the lunch & dinner menus were excellennt,  I can strongly recommend the crab soup!

title: Превосходно
cons: The room was a lil run down and a bit basic. For the cost, I expected something a bit nicer. It wasn't bad, just didn't meet my expectations.
pros: The food at the restaurant was great, and the staff was incredibly helpful.

title: Очень хорошо
cons: - the toilets in the hotel where filthy. (not in the room)
pros:
- Nice and spacious rooms
- friendly people

title: Peaceful and relaxing environment, I would rate Omali as one of the best hotels in the city.
cons: The food I had at dinner time did not meet my expectation, it could have been way better knowing that the cuisine from São Tomé and Príncipe is very rich. Although Omali has an international menu, I feel that the execution of some dishes could have been better.
pros: The atmosphere at Omali is very enjoyable, the rooms are clean and excellent breakfast selection, lots of options. The food I had for dinner could have been better, was not my favourite and prices are quite high, locals could never afford a dinner for almost €40 when the minimum wage is €50; therefore Omali is definitely a location only for tourists or locals with money.

title: Хорошо
cons: The rooms do not have a enough light, very dark.
pros: The breakfast was good.The bedroom was a nice size.The pool area was relaxing.

title: Best option on Sao Tome, wonderful manager and great food.
cons: Not much atmosphere, it feels more like an airport hotel
pros: Fantastic food and staff, will go the extra mile.

title: Превосходно
cons: You need a car to go anywhere, but that’s OK
pros: Great room and delicious breakfast!

title: Nothing special
cons: expensive, charge as 5 star and for me has 3 stars. Food not as good they charge. Too expensive
pros: Location, Bed, cleaning room

title: We had a great time but more about the amazing island than the hotel
cons: Overall the place was somewhat soulless and compared to the rest of the island was not at all a stunning location, however convenient for the airport and onwards trip to principe. Practical and comfortable but lacking character and identity.
pros: The staff were nice and garden/pool area was cool. The food (other than breakfast) was really fantastic, like next level.

title: Very comfortable
cons: The hotel could have some renovations; it looks a bit worn out even though for São Tomé’s standards it’s still 5-star and is compared to all the other hotels on the island. The gym and tennis court need renovations. The beach right in front of the hotel isn’t really as nice as expected; not really inviting for swimming. You need a taxi to go into town, taxis can get pricy.
pros: The location is very near airport and very good as a start point for further explorations. Staff is very friendly and helpful. The food is nice; very fresh and most of it giving a wonderful introduction to the local kitchen. The pool is very nice and great to spend some hours at. The gym and tennis court need renovations though.

title: Превосходно
cons: Little variety in the breakfast options.
pros:
Great and friendly staff
Clean rooms
Helpful concierge

title: Очень хорошо
cons:
Menu is very limited with not many options for children.
Tours offered by the hotel are over-priced. Better to look for options outside the hotel.
The reception was often left alone because the same person is both receptionist and driver. Very inconvenient when trying to check out.
pros:
The property is well maintained, beds are confortable and food is delicious.
Staff are helpful but not always available.

title: Достаточно хорошо
pros: lack of attention to the customer. we got a stormy night and it started raining in the room.We were assigned a room at the back of the hotel and asked to be assigned a room closer to the restaurant and other services because my friend was very sick and needed assistance. They did not take this into consideration and were not flexible in assigning us a room closer and the hotel was not fully booked. Location away from the city of São Tomé.

title: Perhaps  the wrong hotel for my standard and not good value for money at all.
cons: No mosquito nets in the room. Dusty bedroom. No bottled water. Room service lacks improvement/training. Poor cleaning standards, missing towels, poor supervision? It feels that there are no audits to the room, ensuring a standard service is being provided. No tea selection whatsoever, same breakfast for 11 days :( Just bored.Receptionists extremely rude and lacking customer service. Every time I asked for a taxi, the same driver came and always overcharged by a lot. After a long chat with a few other customers we have understood Receptionists have a little of side business going on. Probably some drivers are paying off the receptionists. Omali is the most expensive hotel in Sao tome so anyone staying the are considered to be quite wealthy Anyway, it did take me nearly 5 days to understand what is going on.Having this said Domingos, Ines, Ricardo all great Staff, would love to see them again. In general all Staff are actually amazing and caring about guests. Silly thing as higher you go on the role, worst the service.
pros: Nice room with plenty of space, could use less furniture in to be able to move around freely. Fully accessible, at the back of the property which allow us to sleep quietly.

title: Very nice outside the capital (capital city  needs a lot of improvements...)
cons: Breakfast.
pros: Breakfast could be more perfect. Location ok. Staff very well.

title: 2 star hotel at best
cons: Room service/cleaning was appalling Rug was never cleaned had stains and never hooveredGlasses were not changed but instead washed in the room?! Given it’s not safe to drink the tap water this led to stomach issues.Sheets never cleaned. House keeping were rude/ had an attitude.One variety of eggs at breakfast- scrambled- although taste wise nice- always cold. If you ask for any other eggs be warned they will charge you 1.50 euro per egg.Customer service is a major downfall for this hotel.
pros: Pool was nice. The grounds are pretty. Some staff (around 3-4 of them) were superb.

title: One of the best hotels in São Tomé
cons: Unfortunately the pool was under maintenance during my stay.
pros:
Everything, the staff was super nice and helpful. The food was great and it’s near the city center.
They will help you with car and travel arrangements.
Don’t miss out on the thematic dinner on Friday’s, it’s really wonderful.
The hotel is COVID proof, you choose the breakfast the previous day and get it delivered on your doorstep at the arranged time

title: Mediana
cons: Não trocaram as toalhas diariamente, um dos 7 dias o quarto não foi arrumado, apesar da indicação na porta. Pequeno almoço limitado mais informaram-me que estava relacionado com a região.Situação muito desagradável num dos dias em que cheguei mais tarde, perto das 2 da manhã, encontrei a receção fechada e o funcionário demorou mais de 10 minutos para abrir. Após a referida abertura colocou em causa a minha palavra, apesar de ter o segurança do Hotel ao meus lado, em como não tinha tocado à campainha ou mesmo batido nos vidros da fachada do hotel. A reclamação foi apresentada no dia seguinte na receção do Hotel.
pros: O quarto era espaçoso e cama confortável. A piscina estava limpa.

title: Sehr schöner Abschluss unseres Aufenthalts in São Tomé. Das Hotel war großzügig beim late check-out. Transfer zum Flugha
cons: Personal in den Restaurants, besonders beim Frühstück, war offensichtlich unerfahren. Da aktuell alle, die irgendwie können, nach Portugal auswandern, darf man nicht allzu viel Erfahrung voraussetzen
pros: Sehr hübsche Anlage mit schönem Pool und direkt am Stadtstrand. Tauchcenter zu Fuss ganz in der Nähe erreichbar.

title: Bien mais pas parfait
cons: La piscine n'a pas été utilisable pour 3 jours pour cause de maintenance... Les pizzas sont bonnes mais le service est extrêmement long (2h30 pour un dîner a 3 avec un restaurant loin d'être complet)
pros: Hôtel bien placé à côté de l'aéroport et de la mer! Les chambres sont correctes.

title: serviu para uma noite e usufruir das comodidades até um voo tardio. de resto não percebo a relação preço-qualidade

pros: nada surpreende pelo preço que se paga.

title: Piece of Paradise
pros:
everything was beyond perfect, the staff were very helpful and friendly, and they did everything to make my state amazing.
The room was beyond my expectations super clean and had everything I wanted.
The spa was amazing.
The food was super delicious and creative.
I loved how they creat ideas for the dinner and breakfast, which made the experience unforgettable.
All the activities were amazing - despite the weather conditions - it was great to live the full experience in the island from being out with the local people to going on a solo boat trip to discover as much hidden beaches as i can.

title: Paraiso
cons: Cobertura de internet devia ser mais abrangente.
pros: Gostei particularmente da localização em completa harmonia com a natureza.Os quartos soberbos, com decoração adequada, espaçosos, muito confortáveis, com janelas enormes e com alpendres à volta da "tenda" fizeram a ligação plena com a natureza e a praia.  Gostei da disponibilidade de viaturas todo terreno modernas e bem conservadas que foram usadas para as  deslocações na ilha.Pela simpatia, pelo conhecimento da história de Principe e conhecimento da ilha tenho que fazer referência ao Mike, o guia que organizou as visitas realizadas.

title: Parfait
cons: Tout était parfait, si je me permets il serait bien que le personnel surtout a la réception parle un peu plus anglais, mais ce n'est qu'un détail
pros:
Un endroit sublime entre forêt équatoriale et océan! Un grand respect pour la nature et un aspect écologique présent et bien pensé! Du personnel adorable et ravi de nous faire découvrir leur culture et pays
Un petit paradis

title: Fantastic and very welcoming hosts, a good place to stay in Sao Tomé
cons: The noise: noise from the street, and from the church on Sunday morning.
pros: Nilda and Philippe are fantastic hosts, kind, interesting and very helpful. Food is good and varied, and the facilities are clean and comfortable.

title: Очень плохо
cons: Just moved out of this hotel to another one at 10pm. Extremely hot in the room even with a working fan near my bed, no air, very noisy. I was even more surprised when, going to another hotel, discovered that in was fresher on street, than in the room. Furthermore, it is not easy to find the hotel, since there is no signs outside at all
pros: The administrator was a very kind woman, thank speaks a good english

title: Хорошо
cons:
I stayed several days and after I checked out and left my bag on the common area, I came back to get my bag and wanted to use the shower in the common area before my flight. I was asked to pay 5 euros to use the shower! Bare in mind a whole night’s stay is between 11-17 euros here! So asking 5 euro for a 5 min shower was outrageous! And to point out again, the bathroom was not inside the room, it was in the commin area. Even luxury hotels all around the workd allow customers to use the bathrooms in common areas with no extra charge! 
This was shocking as the host was normally quite friendly during my stay.  I did not use the shower afterall to make a point that the ask was not kind and was outrageous.
pros: Good location, clean, big rooms, living room and a small verenda for common use. Price was good value

title: Great place to be
pros: Nilda, the owner, was so friendly and helpfully. We don t speak portugease, but her english is great. She gave us important informations for example where we have to go for dinner, which places on the beautiful island we had to visit and organized our transport early in the morning to the airport. It was a pleasure for us to stay there. Thanks a lot!

title: Lugar acogedor
pros: Nilda la dueña de la casa como su familia son una maravilla de personas, te ayudan en todo y siempre con una sonrisa.

title: Experiencia inolvidable
pros: Las vistas son espectaculares, pero lo mejor es la familia que trabaja en el alojamiento, te hacen sentir como uno mas de la familia, te transmiten su alegría, buenisimas personas.

pros: Espaço simples, num ambiente caseiro e familiar, onde não faltou nada. Fomos acolhidos como parte da família, mas nunca faltou privacidade. O local, apesar de ser no centro da cidade, até era mais calmo do que esperava.

title: Превосходно

Nilda é una host eccezionale, parla perfettamente inglese, disponibilissima, simpatica e prepara ottime colazioni.

title: Très bon séjour.
cons: La difficulté à trouver la guesthouse qui n'est pas signalée.
pros: Nilda a été une personne très serviable et très à l'écoute des besoins.Les repas préparés par Fernanda étaient excellents et ont permis de découvrir la cuisine locale.Les petits déjeuners sont très copieux.Elle nous a également permis de découvrir la culture locale en nous faisant partager un évènement local d où nous étions les seuls étrangers.Je précise que mon séjour a été plus long que prévu suite à des soucis de santé, cela explique, sans doute, cette proximité qui s'est installée. La guesthouse ne comporte que trois chambres, ce qui gomme le côté "industriel" de certaines.Aucuns frais supplémentaires et "surprises" n'ont été facturés.

title: Великолепно
pros:
Accueil sympathique et disponibilite
Chambre et salle de bain propres
Rapidité des réponses lors des échanges
Excellente situation géographique a Sao tome ville

title: Великолепно
pros: La gentillesse de la propriétaire, toujours disponible pour rendre service, établissement très propre et près du centre ville

title: Relación  calidad /precio excellente
cons: Nada de especial. Siempre hay algo que se pueda mejorar pero lo esencial está bien
pros: La amabilidad de la persona que gestiona el piso. Una persona muy disponible para cuando se necesita. La ubicación es perfecta, en el corazón de la cuidad.

title: Wonderful home away from home!
cons: Everything was great
pros: Everything is new and designed with great taste. Clean, modern and 100% functional. Excellent customer service. Always a yes and a smile. Found friends you can rely upon at Kenito Hotel! And special thanks to Kenito himself, for being such a great host and taking a special interest in all of his guests. We really felt at home!!! We’ll be back soon.

title: Великолепно
pros: I truly loved my stay at the hotel. The staff was super friendly and helpful, despite the fact that I could not speak Portuguese. The owner has really thought through every detail of a tourist's need, especially when it is your first time, and was always available if I needed help with translation or a ride somewhere. The location is also convenient, close to the city center, a couple of restaurants, and the airport. It was definitely one of my highlights during my stay.

title: Great staff and exclusive location
cons: When we were there the water pressure in the shower and sink was very low and needed repair. Ask if it functions well when you book.
pros: The house is in an absolutely quiet, secluded location only 3 km from the airport terminal on a bay. The equipment is as described. However, it is absolutely necessary to use the host's pick-up service because you can only reach the house with a large 4x4 off-road vehicle (a Susuki Jimmi is not sufficient). For us, everything worked out perfectly, the driver named Pequeno and Álvaro (speaks a little French) picked us up from the airport and we did some shopping at the supermarket before we were brought to the guesthouse. You can also book meals. Álvaro is an excellent cook. From the house you can also walk along the beach to Micolo which takes about 30 minutes. There you can eat fish and octopus very cheaply in the restaurant (between 50 and 100 Dobras approx. 2 - 4 €).

title: Frist time
cons:
The marker on the map is on wrong place. Its in reality downhill like 300 meters. (Maybe they already fixed it).
The communication to get from wrong marker to correct one took us more then one hour and involvement of about half of the Conde village.
We took help from friendly local moto riders to transport us there and it took us very long time to understand that we have to pay for that service. This is just how Sao Tome works, not feature of this place.
We dont speek portugeese, so knowledge of local language might help alot.
Some aircons do not work, there was no hot water.
Deffinitelly strange for us was camera in main room. I think this might scare some travellers.
pros:
We were the first ever to rent this place.
Its cheap and quite well equipped. We used just beds, wifi, aircon and bathroom which were fine... i cannot judge the rest.
Owner of the place was very cool and friendly guy who invited us for a dinner and beer which was awesone. He also helped us arranging transport to our next destination.

title: Ужасно
pros:
Como gostar de alguma coisa é tudo fale e como pode a plataforma permiti com q isso aconteça e não fui o único.
Local desconhecido telefones q não respondem as chamadas entre outros,nos causou um prejuízo muito grande além da decepção com a plataforma em mostrar este lugar como opção de hospedagem,nós sugerindo q a mesma não verifica antes de apresentá-los.
Faço reservas por outra plataforma e nunca tivemos qualquer problema,foi uma verdadeira decepção.

title: Casa fake: anuncio confuso e pouco responsável
cons: - A casa, na verdade, não estava disponível embora no site sim aparecia. - A casa aparecia duplicada no site.- O endereço estava errado.- O preço que o propietário falou ao telefone (mesmo a casa não estava disponível) estava errado porque diz que era por pessõa e não a casa enteira.- O numero de contacto não era de São Tomé e devimos pagar a chamada para outro pais.
pros: Nada porque mesmo a casa estava disponível quando fizemos a reserva, quando chegamos lá o endereço que estava errado e o propietário não encontrava-se no pais (ainda bem que tendeu ao telefone).

title: Great hospitality
pros: Fernando was an extremely friendly host who speaks good french and the house is ideal if you stop over in São Tomé to go to Principe the next morning, as you can't get closer to the airport and Fernando picks you up. Sometimes electricity or water don't work as intended, which is just how it is on the island, and the host gladly helps to find solutions. Great value for money.

title: Nice place
cons: There was a storm that knocked out internet but I got a SIM card so not a major issue.  Internet restored the next morning.
pros: Location right next to airport so very convenient for arrival.  Common mini bus only costs 20 Dobras $1 so easy enough to get to town.  Hosts are extremely nice and accommodating.

title: the place to be to make the first steps on this island
cons: nothing
pros:
This accommodation was for us the start of a dream vacation. The comfort and size of the accommodation alone would be reason for us to rate highly. In addition, the incredibly dear and impressive host. We very rarely get into raptures, but this host is a sensation: so warm, so interesting and interested: simply impressive and what a gift to experience.  A few more words about the accommodation. The accommodation is large, very clean and has a sensational terrace. The bed is perfect and large, windows have mosquito protection, are tight and even have blinds (so you can make it nice and dark to sleep) The garden is a dream. You not only see (almost) all the fruits you dream of, but also get them served for breakfast. 
Indescribably beautiful as already mentioned the meeting with the landlord Mr. Simão. Many recommendations, lots of interesting information and conversations about the region. 
It was also ingenious to arrive so late and have a place to stay so close to the airport. We were picked up, although it is only a few hundred meters, with a jeep. After many hours of flight, a luxury to be received so and to land in such a nice accommodation.
Our summary and with focus on a round trip: the perfect place to arrive or depart from São Tomé and Principe and spent time close to airport and a nice beach close to the town.
If we were business travelers we would say: a perfect place to have a nice, calm and safe accommodation away from the center

title: Friendly, good value. Fernando is the best host :)
cons: Nothing. This place rocks.
pros: Breakfast was good. Eggs, bread, fruit. Host is super accommodating and friendly. Place is clean, and close to the airport. Super if you are going to Principe., though a hit of a walk (maybe 45mins) from downtown sao tome.

pros: O quarto estava bem equipado e perto do aeroporto mas principal adorámos a simpatia do Sr. Fernando que foi super querido connosco.

title: Total nett
pros: Super Lage direkt am Flughafen. Total nette Vermieter, sie haben mir sogar nachts um 04:00 Uhr Frühstück bereitet und mich dann auch noch zum Flughafen gefahren.

title: Великолепно
cons: Nada a assinalar.
pros: A simpatia e disponibilidade do sr. Fernando e esposa, o ambiente familiar.

title: Absolute Empfehlung!
cons: Das einzige "Manko" war das Bettlaken, das an der Unterseite aus Plastik war, so hatte man ein wenig das Gefühl, auf einer Plastiktüte hin und her zu rutschen...
pros: Lage: sehr nahe am Flughafen (also eigentlich in fußläufiger Entfernung), dennoch nicht störend oder laut.Frühstück: Alles dabei, was man sich wünscht. Brot, Käse, Früchte, Avocados, täglich wechselnde frische Smoothies aus Früchten aus dem eigenen Garten.Kommunikation: etwas schwierig, da wir kein Portugiesisch oder Französisch sprechen, die Tochter konnte aber ein wenig Englisch. Den Rest konnten wir mit Englisch, Spanisch und Händen und Füßen regeln. Fernando war sehr hilfsbereit, hat uns einen Guide organisiert, der zumindest zwei Sätze Englisch konnte und uns informiert, wo wir die Inlandsflüge nach Principe buchen konnten :) - und wir durften auch für die Dauer unseres Principe-Aufenthalts unseren großen Koffer bei ihm parken.Strom: Meistens da, wenn nicht, sprang sofort das Notstromaggregat an. Wasser: Vorhanden, mit ausreichend Druck und warm !!!Vielen Dank auch an Dodo! Die ganze Family supernett und hilfsbereit! Jederzeit weiterzuempfehlen.

title: ideales Stopover für Principe, gastfreundlich und hilfsbereit, Fernando kann alles organisieren. TOP
pros: sehr freundliche und hilfsbereite Gastgeber, zuverlässige Abholung vom Flughafen, günstige Organisation von Mietwagen, man fühlt sich wie zuhause, französisch oder portugiesisch oder mit Händen und viel Lachen

title: Превосходно
cons: o quarto cheirava um pouco a humidade
pros: simpatia dos donos e boa localização perto aeroporto

title: maravilhosamente bem recebidos
pros: São uma família super simpática e super prestável. o meu namorado esteve doente e a Dódó cozinhou uma canja para ele ficar melhor, todos os dias fazia sumos naturais para o nosso pequeno almoço e vinham perguntar sobre a nossa viagem, se precisávamos de alguma coisa. o sítio é dos melhores da ilha, a rua bem frequentada, tem praias muito próximo (a menos de 1km tem uma) os melhores hotéis estão a menos de um milímetro e o aeroporto também. a melhor zona e a melhor casa da ilha para ser bem recebido. Ainda nos deram medicamentos e sempre disponibilizaram tudo o que precisamos. o alojamento é muito confortável com ar condicionado e todas as comodidades. mesmo quando falta a luz tem gerador. vão deixar muitas saudades

title: Превосходно
cons: Foi dificil encontrar a casa por não ter letreiro mas se tivéssemos telefonado seria bastante fácil… ;)
pros: Os nossos anfitriões tão agradáveis, simpáticos e bons conversadores, priceless!O pequeno almoço saudável e delicioso com sumo de fruta da árvore do jardim. Uma experiência a repetir em breve :)

title: Melhor estadia em São Tomé e príncipe
cons: De não ter ficado mais tempo.
pros: Quarto irrepreensível. O anfitrião muito prestável e disponível. Pequeno almoço magnífico.

title: Великолепно
pros: Fernando, el anfitrión, es genial!!!!

title: Eindeutige Empfehlung!
pros: Frühstück war gut, Lage nahe am Flughafen, aber kein Fluglärm, sehr netter Gastgeber, der uns vom Flughafen abgeholt hat und in jeder Angelegenheit ansprechbar war, Zimmer geräumig mit Dachterrasse, Frühstück war gut.

title: Очень хорошо
pros: Os anfitriões são uma simpatia! Muito prestáveis, serviram-nos o peq almoço levaram-nos ao aeroporto bem cedo. Peq almoço com torrada, fruta, café, sumo. Muito bom

title: Óptimo para quem vai viajar!!
pros:
O Sr.Fernando é extremamente simpático e prestável, fizemos a reserva em cima da hora visto que tivemos o voo cancelado e apesar de não esperar receber hóspedes fez o possível para termos uma estadia confortável.
Para finalizar após um bom pequeno-almoço o Sr.Fernando levou-nos ao aeroporto às 6h da manhã para o nosso voo.

title: Os melhores pequenos almoços.
pros: Do Sr. Fernando e da Sra. Dódó que faz os melhores sumos da ilha . Um casal super simpático e acolhedor que nos prestou todo o apoio e disponibilidade. Muito obrigado, do fundo do nosso coração.

title: Превосходно
cons: Falhas de energia..... manutenção do edifício pouco cuidado
pros: Simpatia do pessoal

title: Очень хорошо
cons: Apenas pequenos detalhes sem importância, e mais importante, após sinalizados, serem resolvidos
pros: Uma casa com bastante espaço. Instalações com nível elevado para o padrão local. Gerador de emergência que facilita muito. Manuel e a Carla super disponíveis para ajudar em tudo.

title: Хорошо
cons: Discoteca mesmo em frente, algumas noites sem dormir, mas leve leve é São Tomé e Príncipe. A casa em si é excelente para o meu grupo de voluntários humanitários, tem um pequeno jardim lindíssimo em frente da casa, mas a limpeza interior deixa muito a desejar, têm que aprimorar mais. Os funcionários todos foram excelentes e muito atenciosos para qualquer eventualidade.
pros: Da localização bem no centro da cidade, está perto de tudo

title: Acomodação completa, boa organização!
pros: В данном отзыве отсутствуют комментарии

title: a repetir !
pros:
alojamento localizado mesmo no meio da comunidade , excelente localização para quem quer estar mais contacto com os locais e longe de turistas 
anfitrião extremamente simpático e pequeno almoço incrível (5€ por pessoa )
